title: repo name in header should be with "/"
description: e.g. this repo is displayed as pengelbrecht--ticks. Should be pengelbrecht/ticks. -- was just used because / caused trouble in some of the web serving
closed_reason: Fixed repo name display by removing the / to -- conversion in parseGitRemote() functions. The conversion was originally added for URL-path safety but wasn't needed since the repo name is only used for display (header badge) and JSON messages (cloud sync). Updated both server/server.go and cloud/client.go.
